261.メインストーリー『遥かなる故郷へのおはなし』クリア: Cleared Main Story "To a Faraway Hometown"

369.メインストーリー『悠久の果ての決戦のおはなし』クリア: Cleared Main Story "At the Ends of Eternity"

409.メインストーリー『嵐穿つ断罪の虚空のおはなし』クリア: Cleared Main Story "A Judgment of Storms"

491.メインストーリー『目覚めし五つの種族のおはなし』クリア: Cleared Main Story "Awakening of the Five Tribes"

573.メインストーリー『赤き大地の双王子のおはなし』クリア: Cleared Main Story "Two Princes of the Red Land"

636.メインストーリー『紡がれし勇気の絆のおはなし』クリア: Cleared Main Story "Woven Bonds of Courage"

869.連れている仲間モンスターの転生回数3回以上＆レベル45以上: Have a Monster with 3+ Reincarnations and Level 45+

995.転生回数3回以上＆レベル45以上の仲間モンスターがいる: Have a Monster with 3+ Reincarnations and Level 45+

1334.クエスト『はるかなる釣り道「その者 釣り老師」』クリア: Cleared Quest "Faraway Fishing Path 'The Master of Fishing'"

1518.『英雄はすべてを救う』『明日へのコーダ』『魔物たちの挽歌』クリア: Cleared "A Hero Saves All", "Coda's Tomorrow", "Monster's Elegy"

1724.住宅村に 自分の家を 建てることができます。\n空いてる土地は 立て札を調べるこ:
You can build your own house in the residential village. You can buy
vacant land by looking up the sign. To build a house, you will need a
"House Kit" sold at the building shop. Build a house of your choice by
arranging "Decor" and "Garden Decor"!

1896.フィールドにいるモンスターを討伐するクエストです。\n１日１回 一部の町にいる討:
This is a quest to defeat monsters in the field. Once per day, You can
receive a request from a member of the Strike Force in some towns.
Recommended for adventurers who want to earn experience and gold.

2028.フィールドにいるモンスターを討伐するクエストです。\n１週間に１回 グランゼドー:
This is a quest to defeat monsters out in the field.
Once per week, you can receive a request from
the Strike Force member in Gran Zedora. These
requests grant a lot of experience points.

2165.クエスト『あの人に追いつきたくて』クリア: Cleared Quest "I Want to Catch Up to Them"

2196.ナドラガンドの各領界にいるモンスターを討伐していくクエストです。\nたくさんの経:
This is a quest to defeat monsters in each territory of Nadragand. You
will get a lot of experience and gold. In addition, you will receive a
completion reward by completing all the requests in one realm.

2348.バージョン４のフィールドにいるモンスターを討伐するクエストです。\nたくさんの経:
This is a quest to defeat monsters in the field in version 4. You can
get a lot of experience and gold. In addition, you can receive a
completion reward by completing all the requests of one era.

2500.仲間モンスターと協力して挑戦するクエストです。\n４人の冒険者と ４匹の仲間モン:
This is a quest in which you and your fellow monsters cooperate to
fight a boss monster in a party alliance battle between four
adventurers and four fellow monsters. Make sure to train your fellow
monsters well before taking on the challenge.

2642.強力なモンスターの能力をマネた ５人の演者たちを相手に\nどこまで勝ち進めるか挑:
In this content, players challenge five performers who mimic the
abilities of powerful monsters to see how far they can go. Even if you
are eliminated, you will receive rewards up to the end of the game, so
feel free to take on the challenge.

2769.パーティ同盟バトルが待ち受ける 長編クエストです。\n突如現れ ガケっぷち村を滅:
A party alliance battle awaits you in this feature-length quest. You
will fight to protect the world from the King of Calamity who suddenly
appears in the ruins of Precipice Village. When you challenge the King of
Calamity at the end of the story, the battle will be a party alliance battle
with 8 players.

2932.パーティ同盟バトルが待ち受ける 長編クエストです。\n高名な占い師グランマーズの:
A party alliance battle awaits you in this feature-length quest. With
the help of the renowned fortune teller Madame Luca, you will pursue the
mystery of the deadly nightmares that assail you. At the end of the
story, when you challenge the incarnation of destruction and murder,
you will battle in a party alliance of eight players.

3116.レンダーシアの各地に発生した 謎の「ヒズミ」を\nとある同行者とともに調査してい:
This is a full-length quest in which you and a certain companion
investigate the mysterious "Strain" that has occurred in various parts
of Lendersia. The storyline ends with a party alliance battle.

3229.「アスフェルド学園」を舞台にした 長編クエストです。\n学園で出会う仲間たちとと:
This is a full-length quest set in Asfeld Academy. Save the school from
a crisis with your friends you meet at the school. There are many
elements unique to "Asfeld Academy".

3357.神聖秘文字で書かれた 「万象流転の書」の解読に挑戦します。\nサジェとリルチェラ:
Challenge yourself to decipher the "Book of All Things", written in
a sacred text. Join Sajay and Lilcherat for mini-games and photo
shoots as they unravel the changes that have taken place in Nadragand.

3483.妖精図書館にある本へと入って進めていく 長編クエストです。\n「記憶の本」の登場:
It's a long quest where you enter the books in the Fairy Library. You
will be a character in the "Memory Book" and go on an adventure. It
will test your deductive powers to solve mysteries and break through
difficulties.

3602.謎解きを楽しむ長編クエストです。\n絶海の孤島に建つ 「紅玉館」で起きる事件の真:
A long quest for those who enjoy solving mysteries. This is the story
of the mysterious "Ruby Mansion", which lies on an isolated island.
Your skills of deduction will be put to the test.

3700.さまざまなミニゲームで遊ぶことができる施設です。\nスロット・ポーカー・ルーレッ:
This facility allows you to play a variety of mini-games. You can get
"Casino Tokens" by playing games such as slots, poker, and roulette.
"Casino Tokens" can be exchanged for useful items for adventures and
fun items such as "Decor," "Garden Decor," and "Dol Radio".

3898.スライムを育成して レースで競走させるコンテンツです。\n期間限定の「アストルテ:
This content lets you train slimes to compete in races. You can get
gorgeous rewards by challenging the Limited Time "Astoltia Cup".

4006.ドルボードに乗って フィールド上を疾走するレースです。\nスタート地点からゴール:
This is a race where you ride a Dolboard across a field. Players
compete for the best time from the starting point to the finish line.
You can practice for the "Dolboard Race Grand Prix" as many times as
you like.

4139.「バトエン」を転がし ライバルたちと遊ぶコンテンツです。\n３本の「バトエン」を:
In this content, players roll "Batoen" and play against rivals,
combining three "Batoen" to form a deck. The key to victory lies in the
order of the "Batoen" in the deck and the timing of the turnover. Feel
free to challenge yourself.

4293.水辺に近づくと 魚を釣ることができます。\n「おさかな交換員」で 釣った魚を「お:
You can catch fish by approaching bodies of water. The fish you
catch can be exchanged for Fish Coins at Fish Exchangers. The
Fish Master in Lendor will also reward you based on how many
types of fish you catch. Caught fish can also be placed in your
indoor aquariums or outdoor fish ponds.

4473.種族ごとのクラブに属して 勝ち点を競い合う\nみつどもえのバトルコンテンツです。:
In this three-way battle content, players compete for victory points by
belonging to clubs of their own race. Aim for victory, win bases, and
collect jewels. In the limited-time "Battle Trinity", unite and do your
best to win.

4641.１枚の写真を手がかりに 隠されたお宝を探し出すコンテンツです。\nパーティメンバ:
This is a content that searches for hidden treasures using a single
photo as a clue. All party members can participate in the search, so it
is a good idea to go searching together.

4745.世界のどこかに現れる 独特な姿をしたモンスターを探し出し\n「モンスターシール」:
Find and collect "Monster Stickers" to find unique-looking monsters
that appear somewhere in the world. By collecting stickers, you can
learn about monster ecology and obtain items and monster statues.

4936.エステラのお部屋を訪れて 彼女が大好きな「ぬいぐるみ」を\nプレゼントしましょう:
Visit Estella's room and give her a "Plushie" she loves. She will
surely be pleased. The plushies you give her will be displayed on the
shelves. If you give her a lot of gifts, good things may happen...?

5090.メレアーデのお部屋に 彼女が大好きなネコを 集めましょう。\nメレアーデが ネコ:
Gather the cats she loves in Mereade's room. Mereade will take care of
the cats. You may try to find your favorite one. If you collect a lot
of cats, something good may happen...?

5251.ネコの「ついてクンカプセル」を 手に入れることができます。\nガニャポンに必要な:
Here, you can get pet capsules of various cats. The Cat Coins
needed can be exchanged for your Mini Medals. There's also
some special packs that appear under certain conditions...

5400.仲間モンスターだけのパーティで モンスター格闘場の\nモンスターとバトルするコン:
In this content, you battle monsters in the Monster Arena with a party
of only your fellow monsters. You can win various prizes including
fashionable equipment. Collect "badges" to further strengthen your
fellow monsters.

5552.メインストーリーで戦ったボスモンスターと 再戦できます。\n一部のボスモンスター:
You can rematch the boss monsters you fought in the main storyline.
Some boss monsters have "Very Hard" difficulty levels. It is a good way
to test your strength to see how much stronger you are than before.

5689.町にいる「達人」から 毎週５つのクエストが提示されます。\nその中からひとつ選ん:
Five quests are presented each week by the "Master" in town. Choose one
of them, and by accomplishing it, you will be rewarded with a set
number of pearls. Let's challenge the one you think you can accomplish
from various conditions.

5844.職人になると 装備品や家具を作ったり\nさまざまな錬金効果をつけたりすることがで:
As a craftsman, you can create equipment, decor and add various
alchemical effects. The items you create can be bought and sold at
facilities such as the "Traveler's Bazaar". First, practice and improve
your craftsmanship.

5996.謎の遺跡島にある 正体不明のダンジョンを探索するコンテンツです。\n探索で手に入:
This content involves exploring an unidentified dungeon on the Isle of
Ruins. You can get various kinds of armor by bringing back the "Abyss
Orbs" obtained in the exploration to the exit. Think about the order of
the rooms so that you can visit as many rooms as possible.

6162.入るたびに構造が変わるダンジョンを探索し\n最深部にいるボスを討伐するコンテンツ:
In this content, players explore a dungeon whose structure changes each
time they enter it and defeat the boss at the deepest level. You can
get a "Lottery Ticket" once a day by clearing the dungeon, so it's a
good idea to keep playing.

6298.魔法の迷宮で戦うことができる 特別なボスモンスターです。\n「コイン」「メダル」:
These are special boss monsters that can be fought in the Magic Maze.
By offering "Coins", "Medals", "Boss Cards" and "summons", you can
fight the corresponding boss. If you succeed in defeating the bosses,
you can obtain powerful accessories. The low Lv bosses are more
suitable for beginners, so it is recommended to refer to them.

6518.ピラミッドの霊廟に現れる モンスターの集団を撃退しましょう。\n次々にモンスター:
Fight off the groups of monsters that appear in the Pyramid's Tomb.
Since the monsters appear one after another, it is important not only
to defeat them, but also to heal carefully and conserve MP. You can get
a reward from one Tomb only once a week.

6702.勇者姫アンルシアや仲間モンスターと共に ダンジョンを探索し\n最深部にいる ボス:
Players explore a dungeon with Anlucia herself, and can bring along
their fellow monsters. The goal is to defeat the boss at the deepest
level. There's a strict time limit, so players must best decide how
to spend the precious time they have.

6874.８人でのパーティ同盟で挑む バトルコンテンツです。\nボスモンスターの組み合わせ:
This is a battle content in which players challenge in 8-person party
alliances. The combination of boss monsters and challenges changes each
time, so cooperation and ingenuity are required to win. The "Heavenly
Gate" which appears under certain conditions, offers even tougher
battles.

7043.そびえたつ塔の中にひそむ モンスターを倒しながら\n上の階を目指していくダンジョ:
The dungeon is a towering dungeon where you aim for the upper floors
while defeating monsters hidden in the towers. You cannot bring in
items or gold that you have acquired during your adventures outside the
tower. You will start from level 1 with a special job, so train
yourself in the tower as you progress.

7227.住宅の庭に 畑を設置すると\n花や作物のタネをまいて 育てることができます。\n:
When you set up a field in the garden of a house, you can sow seeds of
flowers and crops and grow them. Take care of them every day to get
items such as flowers for dyeing and ingredients for cooking.

7345.装備品や素材を 訪れた冒険者に販売するための家具です。\n「収納家具」内のアイテ:
This decor is used to sell equipment and materials to visiting
adventurers. You can select items in the "Storage" and set the sales
amount. It is fun to decorate your home and open your own store.

7470.モンスターの軍団から 防衛拠点を守るバトルコンテンツです。\nみんなで協力して:
This is battle content to protect the defense base from a monster
corps. Let's cooperate with others to defend the defense wards. You can
exchange various weapons and shields at the "Reward Exchange Y" by
collecting "Defense Medals" and materials.

7627.次々と迫りくるモンスターを倒していく スコアアタックバトルです。\nたくさんのモ:
This is a score attack battle where you have to defeat monsters that
come at you one after another. Aim for a high score by defeating many
monsters. If you are wiped out, the game will not be cleared and your
score will be zero, so it is an important strategy to carefully retreat
from the battle.

7802.ナドラガンドに現れた 強敵たちに挑みます。\n挑戦には「竜牙石」が必要となります:
You will challenge the powerful enemies who appeared in Nadragand. To
challenge them, you will need "Dragonite". Each monster has five levels
of health, and you can choose which level you want to challenge before
you fight. This is a great test of strength for adventurers who are
confident in their skills.

7967.古代の羅刹たちの復活を阻止するため 強敵たちに挑みます。\n挑戦には「破魔石」が:
The challenge is to prevent the resurrection of an ancient demon. The
challenge requires a "Demonbreaker Stone". These demons are among the
strongest in Astoltia. Even adventurers with confidence in their skills
will find it extremely difficult to defeat them.

8110.４対４でプレイヤー同士がバトルする施設です。\n「公式バトル」で ランキングの頂:
This is a facility where players battle each other in 4-on-4 matches.
Aim for the top of the ranking in the "Official Battle" or compete your
skills as a fighter. You can also win prizes in the Limited Time
"Battle Grand Prix".

8250.目標として提示された能力値の達成を目指すコンテンツです。\n達成することで スキ:
This content is designed to achieve the ability values presented as
goals. By achieving the target, you will receive rewards such as Skill
Books. Make full use of the weapons and armor accessories you equip and
raise your level to reach the target values.

8401.魔界では まれに「輝晶獣」という強力なモンスターが出現します。\nこの輝晶獣が持:
In the Demon World, powerful monsters called Crystalbeasts appear on
rare occasions. Collecting Coruscating Cores from Crystalbeasts will
give your weapon an additional effect called Shine. You can also
challenge Crystalbeasts yourself by collecting Demon Cells obtained
from monsters throughout the Demon World.

8584.期間限定で開催される 生き残りクイズバトルです。\n制限時間内に正解と思う扉を選:
This is a Quiz Battle for survival held for a limited time. You choose
the door you think is the correct answer within the time limit and
proceed to the next room. The questions are all different depending on
the date and time of the event. Please challenge "Hellbound Headmaster"
who is on the top floor of Fort Wisdom!

8765.期間限定で開催される おたから集めコンテンツです。\n幻の海トラシュカへ向かう航:
This is a limited time event where you can collect lots of treasure
for points. Players will voyage to a mysterious sea called Trashka,
where they will collect treasure for points while dodging all
sorts of hazards. You can even check how you rank up against
your friends and teammates.

8932.期間限定で開催される 追いかけっこコンテンツです。\n３人の追跡チームと ５人の:
This is a limited time only catch and run content. The teams will be
divided into a 3-member Tracking Team and a 5-member Escapee Team. The
Tracking Team wins if they catch everyone within the time limit. The
Escapee Team wins if even one person escapes. Let's run around without
giving up until the end!

9119.期間限定で開催される スライムたちとのかくれんぼです。\nステージに隠れているス:
This is a hide-and-seek game with slimes held for a limited time.
Players compete for scores by finding as many slimes as possible hidden
in the stage. Cooperative play by a party is important to get a high
score. Aim for a high score and find slimes as fast as you can!

9295.特殊なクイズバトルに 挑むことができるコンテンツです。\n対戦相手のレモンハルト:
This content allows you to challenge special quiz battles. Your
opponent, Lemonheart, becomes a monster and uses the same "Skills" and
"Spells". Guess what kind of monster it is based on the information you
get during the battle and receive experience and rewards!

9472.トランプの「大富豪」を 遊ぶことができます。\n配られた手札を ルールにしたがっ:
You can play "Tycoon". The winner is the first player to play a hand of
cards according to the rules and the first player to run out of cards
in his or her hand. You can play with your friends or practice by
yourself. You can also try out the "Ranked" Daily Rules.

9655.高額なゴールドが当たる ビッグでドリームな「くじ券」です。\n駅の売店で購入する:
It's a big and dreamy "Lottery Ticket" with a high gold prize. You can
buy them at the station kiosks. Even if you don't win, you will receive
a participation prize, so please buy one when sales start.

9789.期間限定で開催される 釣りの大会です。\n特定の場所で 専用の釣り道具を使うこと:
This is a fishing competition held for a limited time only.
Participants compete in the size of seasonal fish that can be caught by
using special fishing equipment at specific locations. Participation
can be made from Fish Master Natsuri, who is located in South Port
Lendor. Let's fish hard for a great reward!

9963.魔界のどこかにいる 幽霊作家バケンズから\n毎週 ５つの依頼を受けることができま:
You will receive five requests each week from Ghost Writer Bakenz
located somewhere in the Demon World. By accomplishing the requests,
you can obtain experience and items. There are a variety of requests
ranging from defeating monsters to taking care of the fields, so let's
check out what kind of requests there are first!

10156.依頼者の心が生みだした ダンジョンを 勇者姫アンルシアや\n仲間モンスターと共に:
Explore a dungeon created by a strong heart alongside Anlucia and your
fellow monsters, and do your best to reach its deepest fathoms. Each
time you clear a dungeon, the Maze's level will increase, causing the
enemies within to grow in power. In turn, this means more experience,
stamps, and Gold earned, as well as a better shot at Augite Belts!

10381.アストルティアのどこかで起こるという 不思議な出来事を\n写真機で撮影するクエス:
This is a quest to use the camera to capture a mysterious event that is
said to take place somewhere in Astoltia. First, let's hear from
Scholar Dokchul on the second floor of the Dolworm Crystal Palace.

10503.期間限定で開催される 大富豪の大会です。\n大会ごとに決められたルールで 記録を:
This is a time-limited Tycoon tournament. Compete for records with
rules determined for each tournament. Enjoy a different atmosphere with
a special background. You will receive luxurious rewards according to
your record.

10643.期間限定で開催される 特別なモンスターバトルロードです。\n８人の冒険者と パー:
This is a special Monster Battle Road that will be held for a limited
time only. Form a party alliance with eight other adventurers to
challenge special monsters. (In some cases, more than 8 people).
Enjoy special battles with your favorite monsters that have been
enhanced with "Badges"!

10838.コロシアム最強の闘士を決定する バトルイベントです。\n頂点を目指して 戦闘のウ:
This is a battle event to determine the strongest fighter in the
Coliseum. Let's compete with each other for the top spot in the battle.
Participation in official battles will not be available during the
event. Special rewards will be prepared for the top ranking fighters!

10995.あらゆる世界へ 侵略の手を伸ばそうとする 大魔王ゾーマ。\nその魔の手が アスト:
Zoma, Master Archfiend, plans to invade every corner of the world,
and Astoltia is no exception. Head to Patty's Party Planning Place to
gather companions, and journey to the castle of the Master Archfiend
himself to put a stop to his wicked ways! Defeating Zoma will earn you
Spirit Sparkles, which can be exchanged for a variety of rewards.

11197.クラブ同士の威信をかけた 期間限定の大会です。\n勝ち点を稼いで 所属クラブを優:
This is a limited-time tournament that pits clubs against each other
for prestige. Earn enough points to take your club to the championship
and bring home the trophy! Participants from the winning club will
receive gold prizes, as well as rewards based on their contributions
and club rankings.

11375.「お祭りコイン」を使って挑戦できる 期間限定のお祭りです。\nポーカー スロット:
This is a limited-time festival that can be challenged using "Festival
Coins". A special casino raid will be held when playing Poker, Slots,
Roulette and Bingo. The coins earned in one raid will be recorded and
the top ranks will be ranked, and you will receive rewards for
defeating raids based on the type of monsters you defeat.

11578.錬金石 経験値 特訓スタンプ ゴールド など: Gems, EXP, Training Stamps, Gold, etc.

11638.経験値 特訓スタンプ ゴールド スキルブック など: EXP, Training Stamps, Gold, Skill Books, etc.

11732.身代わりのコイン 錬金石 ボスカード ボスコイン無料券 など: Substitution Coins, Gems, Boss Cards, Free Boss Coin Tickets, etc.

11836.まりょくのたね お役立ち機能 おしゃれ装備 など: Seed of Sorcery, Useful Functions, Glamour, etc.

11904.まりょくのたね ふしぎなきのみ など: Seed of Sorcery, Seed of Magic, etc.

11932.いのちのきのみ 黄金の花びら など: Seed of Life, Golden Petals, etc.

11980.ルーラストーン 家具庭具 おしゃれ装備 ドルボードプリズム など: Zoomstone, Furniture, Garden Furniture, Glamour, Dolboard Prisms, etc.

12106.経験値の聖典 ボスコイン 黄金の花びら など: EXP Scrolls, Boss Coins, Golden Petals, etc.

12140.ボスコイン 錬金石 ちいさなメダル など: Boss Coins, Gems, Mini Medals, etc.

12171.ちいさなメダル 夢のアクセサリー箱２ 庭具 など: Mini Medals, Dream Accessory Box 2s, Garden Furniture, etc.

12208.８人でのパーティ同盟で強敵に挑む バトルコンテンツです。\nイベントは不定期に開:
This is an 8 player alliance battle against powerful boss enemies.
This event occurs every so often, and the boss will change each
time. Use the items provided and work together as a team to
emerge victorious!

12360.スキルブック ふしぎなきのみ 傘装備: Skill Books, Seed of Magic, Umbrellas

12424.おしゃれ装備 絆のエンブレム スカウトの書 など: Glamour, Bonding Emblems, Scout Books, etc.

12461.スキルブック ちいさなメダル 黄金の花びら など: Skill Books, Mini Medals, Golden Petals, etc.

12705.経験値の古文書 フィギュアチケット 黄金の花びら など: EXP Scrolls, Figure Tickets, Golden Petals, etc.

12746.スキルブック ちからのたね など: Skill Books, Seeds of Strength, etc.

12823.ついてクンカプセル 夢のアクセサリー箱 など: Pet Toys, Dream Accessory Boxes, etc.

12935.ドルボードプリズム おしゃれ装備 家具庭具 など: Dolboard Prisms, Glamour, Furniture, Garden Furniture, etc.

13045.おしゃれ装備 バッジ交換券 ハッピーハート など: Glamour, Badge Tickets, Happy Hearts, etc.

13082.錬金石 ボスコイン 黄金の花びら など: Gems, Boss Coins, Golden Petals, etc.

13136.経験値の聖典 ふくびき券 ボスコイン おしゃれ装備 家具 など: EXP Scrolls, Lottery Tickets, Boss Coins, Glamour, Furniture, etc.

13453.期間限定で開催される ２０人での協力型コンテンツです。\n海底で故障した 潜水艇:
This is a 20-player cooperative content held for a limited time. Let's
collect parts to repair the submarine "Gateria" that broke down at the
bottom of the sea. If you can return safely from the seafloor after
retrieving many treasures, you will get a high score! Let's all help
each other to succeed in the undersea exploration!

13739.バトエンポイント 錬金石 ボスコイン など: Batoen Points, Gems, Boss Coins, etc.

13823.イルーシャの話をヒントに スケッチする場所を探し出しましょう。\n描いてもらった:
Use the hints from Irusha's story to find a place to sketch. You can
see the drawings in her sketchbook in her room.

13927.入るたびに 部屋の内容が変わるダンジョンを探索し\n最深部にいるボスを 討伐する:
In this content, players explore a dungeon whose rooms change each time
they enter, and defeat the boss at the deepest level. Players can
strengthen themselves by growing "Goddess Trees" using "Geneseeds"
given as rewards.

14088.期間限定で開催される バトエンの大会です。\nピックとデッキの異なるルールで\n:
This is a limited time Batoen tournament. The record will be divided
into the first half and the second half with different rules for picks
and decks. You will receive gorgeous rewards according to your record.

14228.深淵の咎人たちが地上に現れるのを阻止するため 強敵たちに挑みます。\n４人もしく:
Challenge powerful enemies to prevent the Abyssal Criminals from
escaping. Challenges can be taken by 4 or 8 players, with different
rewards for each. In 4-player battles, there are two difficulty levels
which change daily. 8-player battles have a fixed difficulty level.
For first timers, an 8-player battle is recommended.

14448.アストルティア世界を 征服しようとする 竜王。\n魔法の迷宮にやってきた ローラ:
The wicked Dragonlord wishes to extend his evil hand and conquer
Astoltia. You'll need to find Princess Gwaelin, who suddenly appeared
within the Magic Maze, and obtain the Rainbow Drop from her. Only
then will you be able to journey to the Dragonlord's castle to put an
end to his malefic schemes.

14777.これまでに戦ったボスたちと 再戦することができるコンテンツです。\nボスたちは:
This content allows you to rematch the bosses you have fought in the
past. The bosses are more powerful than when they appeared in the
story. You can challenge the battle from the "Book of Bosses
Hard Mode Boss Chapter". Rewards can be obtained once a day.

14947.試練の門の強敵たちに 挑戦することができるコンテンツです。\n「強戦士の書・試練:
This content allows you to battle powerful enemies from Trial
Gates. You can challenge them via the Book of Bosses' Trial Gate
chapter. Rewards can be obtained once a week.

15069.これまでに戦った 同盟バトルの強敵たちと \n再戦することができるコンテンツです:
This content allows you to rematch the powerful enemies from Alliance
Battles you have fought in the past. You can challenge them via the
"Book of Bosses Alliance Battle Chapter". Rewards can be obtained
once a day.

15231.港町レンドア北の モコモコハウスにいる\nロスターから お題を受けることができま:
You can receive a task from Roster at Mokomoko House in the North Port
Lendor. Rewards will be given by Roster upon the theme's completion.
The theme is updated on the 1st and 15th of each month.

15388.酒場や町の入口などにある掲示板のことです。\nプレイヤーが応募した絵葉書を掲載す:
Bulletin boards are located in bars, town entrances, etc. You can check
various information such as "Notification Square" where postcards
submitted by players are posted, "World Ranking" where you can see the
ranking of boss defeats and coliseum, "Find a Team" where you can search
for teams you want to join, "Today's Town Info" and so on.

15644.バルディスタ城の地下に用意された スコアアタックバトルです。\n待ち受けるボスの:
This is a score attack battle prepared in the basement of Valdista
Castle. Aim for a high score by dealing a lot of damage within the time
limit while dodging the boss attacks that await you. If you die during
the battle, the challenge ends, so it is important to attack while
calmly avoiding the boss's attacks.

15885.ドルボードに乗って フィールド上を疾走するレースです。\nスタート地点からゴール:
This is a race where you ride a Dolboard across a field. Players
compete for the best time from the starting point to the finish line.
You will be rewarded with a splendid prizes according to your time.

16075.天星郷フォーリオンにいる 筋肉伝道師キタエルから\n毎週 ５つの課題を受けること:
You will receive five weekly tasks from Muscle Evangelist Trayne in
Fourion. By completing these tasks, you can get experience points
and items. There are a variety of tasks, from defeating monsters to
tending to the fields, so be sure to see what's available!

16327.期間限定で開催される スライムレースの大会です。\n育成したスライムでレースに参:
This limited-time event is called the Slime Race Tournament.
Participate in heated races with Slimes that you raise, and try to
aim for the highest rank! You'll receive amazing rewards based
on how well you do!

16477.レクスルクスの楔から赴いた 深淵の檻に突如現れる 伝説の宿敵たち！\n期間限定で:
Legendary nemeses have suddenly appeared in the Abyssal Cage in the
Lexlux Wedge! They can be challenged for a limited time, and their
strength level is fixed. They can be fought with either a party of four
or a party of eight. You can also earn various achievements. If
attempting for the first time, an 8-player party is recommended.

16752.ユーライザの話を聞き 彼女の思い出の場所へ向かいましょう。\n思い出話を聞き そ:
Listen to Yuliza's stories and go to various places that she
remembers. After taking a photo with her in these places,
you can view them using the Photo Frame in her room.

16884.メインストーリー『天に煌めく星のごとくのおはなし』クリア: Cleared Main Story "Like A Shining Star"

16927.バカン山道に突如現れた 謎の穴の先に広がる異界。\n過去に共闘した仲間たちと共に:
Explore the mysterious realm that suddenly appeared within the
Bakan Mountain Pass. Together with your trusted companions, you'll
venture into the depths of this unknown realm. By strengthening
bonds with these companions, you'll earn "Hearts" as proof
of your journey, as well as some untold stories...

17219.特定の周期で 源世庫パニガルム内に出現する\n強力なモンスターを討伐する バトル:
This is a limited-time event where powerful enemies appear inside
Panigalm at certain times per month. They are stronger than the enemies
that appear inside the Origin Vault, but will drop a material known as
as Dark Quartz. This material can be used to grow creatures called
"Abysspirits", which will further increase your power.

17444.８人でのパーティ同盟で挑む バトルコンテンツです。\nボスモンスターにダメージを:
This is battle content for an 8-player party alliance against various
boss monsters. When fighting, five conditions will appear that must
be met. If you're unable to achieve at least three, the battle will
fail. The whole party will need to cooperate if you wish to succeed!

17623.覚醒の鬼石 戦神のベルト など: Super Demon Stones, War God's Belts, etc.
